creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two 4 selvage pieces sewn together; white ground with six large stripes composed of mini stripes of magenta, pink, white, blue, purple and black with sewn on fringe of same colors as striping
dimension: 67 x 57 in. (170.18 x 144.78 cm) (not including fringe)
title: Poncho
